programme.title: Saved By The Barn
programme.desc: As summer arrives, the team host a car wash to raise money for cows and donkeys. Meanwhile, Dan goes on a covert mission to save an injured goat.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: One orphan needs another, more experienced one to help them bed in. The babies are at high risk from parasites ingested from the ground.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Orphaned orangutan Peanut is one of the newest and youngest arrivals at the sanctuary. He has made friends with Beryl, but he is feeling unwell.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: A family who dedicate their time rescuing animals in Australia, release Crickey the koala back into the wild after a year of nursing him back to health.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Journey around the world and discover how dogs became one of the most valued animals on the planet. From wild predators to friendly pets- this is the story of mans best friend.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The displaced Browns struggle through a devastating transition as Ami undergoes tests after health concerns. And Noah braves the wilderness to defend the homestead.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: A major diagnosis shakes the Browns, forcing them to a decision that could change their lifelong journey. And oldest son Matt tries to adjust as he reunites with Noah.

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?
programme.desc: How do koalas keep cool in the Australian sun? How do elephants communicate when they are miles apart? Experts answer these questions!

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?
programme.desc: What are cats trying to communicate to humans? Why have some of the worlds cleverest monkeys turned to a life of crime? Experts answer these questions and more!

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Investigators respond to a report of an injured dog. Events take a dramatic turn when they arrive to discover the dogs paw has been almost completely severed.

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Investigator Liz Pavlicek visits a house where more than 30 spaniels have suffered neglect. The team works to rescue the animals but are shocked by their condition.

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: When a dog is found hanging by her neck in a yard the SPCA tries to save her. And investigators rush to reunite some pups with their mother before its too late.

programme.title: Life at Vet University
programme.desc: The students are halfway through their spring semester rotations. Lindsay has a hectic week treating a mare and foal for pneumonia.

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: In the Mexican desert Bradley Trevor Greive and Billy Almon track down and test the almost supernatural abilities of the giant horned lizard.

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: The team scours the Sonoran Desert for North Americas carnivorous grasshopper mouse. Its bite and vertical leap turn it into a vicious scorpion killer at night.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff and the team head to a remote town offering low-cost care to pets. Plus, Dr. Petra performs life-saving surgery on a Basset Hound that was hit by a car.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Shelter volunteers drive from Kansas hoping the team can save a tiny rescue dog. Dr Jeffs cousin asks for the vets to visit Tennessee to provide free care.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Robert takes part in a research experiment involving a Komodo dragon, while Terri does her best to save a koala that has been given little prospect of survival.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: As Bindi celebrates her 21st birthday, she gets a surprise proposal from her boyfriend. Meanwhile, things get dangerous as Robert wrangles gators in thick mud.

programme.title: The Aquarium
programme.desc: Trainers get two rescued sea lions ready for eye surgery. Meanwhile, intelligent giant octopus, Ophelia, needs attention and the team head to the Bahamas.

programme.title: Pit Bulls And Parolees
programme.desc: A VRC senior dog finally gets the chance to have a forever home when a couple from Idaho come to New Orleans to find a new family member.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Reality series following behavioural expert Jackson Galaxy, who comes to the aid of more desperate cat owners. George and Beth are prisoners in their own home due to their vicious kitty, Reese. The feisty feline is a cat version of Jack the Ripper and Beth is one of his choice targets

programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: Antonio transforms a cramped condo for two cats and a rescue dog. His team builds personalised spaces into the furniture, and install a 20 ft climbing wall.

programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: Antonio and team transform a health-hazard yard into a dog-friendly escape, complete with paw-operat

programme.title: Extinct Or Alive
programme.desc: Forrest combs the Florida Everglades for the black panther, which has never been seen in the US. Discoveries in the area suggest it may be more than a rumour.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Wayde and Brett are asked to create two tanks for hip-hop megastar Akons dream house - but their own dreams of musical stardom look set to derail the build.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: The San Francisco Giants want to bring McCovey Cove inside the ballpark! Can the guys build a tank big enough to impress their loyal fans?

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Basketball legend, Dwight Howard, needs the guys at ATM to design and build a habitat for all 14 of his snakes. And he wants a reptile mansion!

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Four groups of ordinary people are attempting to survive in the Alaskan wilderness. Carolyn Wise heads out on a moose hunt and the Flower Lake group stalks squirrels. The other groups are forced to take desperate measures to find food.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Emergency vet Gerard works fast to help Indie the whippet, whos been rushed in with severe breathing difficulties. It looks bleak when Indies X-rays reveal a serious problem.

programme.title: Saved By The Barn
programme.desc: The barn joins forces with a charity to find homes for four neglected calves. Meanwhile, a litter of piglets are born and Chris builds a playground for the goats.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Scientists around the world are working on projects dealing with space and space travel - extraterrestrial life, colonising Mars, the Big Bang and rocket development.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: British Marine Pen Farthing runs Afghanistans only official animal sanctuary. Hes determined to reunite six dogs with the solider who saved them in Texas.

programme.title: Bad Dog
programme.desc: A dog loves all things ice cream and another dog keeps getting his head stuck in things. Plus, a parrot has a habit of rapping and swearing.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The family prepares to close down Browntown following Amis diagnosis. Meanwhile, Bear, Bird and Rain leave the California heat to return to Alaska.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: As Ami awaits treatment options, the kids set to join Matt in Alaska packing up Browntown. But an accidental explosion leaving Matt injured causes a setback.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: The crew heads to Mongolia in search of taimen: the largest, most ferocious member of the salmon family. Reaching their target will involve a punishing combination of back-breaking mountain trails, treacherous rivers and uncooperative Mongolian horses.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: After historical wildfires strike Australia, the Irwins race to rescue as many animals as possible. Robert and Terri help the severely injured koala population.

programme.title: The Bronx Zoo
programme.desc: A female slow loris has weight problems that stop her from becoming pregnant. Keepers take the penguin colony for a CT scan and an ocopy has pain in his hooves.

programme.title: Saved By The Barn
programme.desc: The barn joins forces with a charity to find homes for four neglected calves. Meanwhile, a litter of piglets are born and Chris builds a playground for the goats.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: An adventurous puppy falls off a trampoline, can Dr. Jeff and Petra mend its broken leg? Meanwhile, Susan takes care of a litter of kittens and their mum.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: NBA superstar Anthony Davis brings Wayde and Brett on board to transform an entire room into an aquarium! Will they be able to deliver a winning tank?

programme.desc: In this special edition, join the rookies to discover what it is like learning to fight crime in one of the toughest cities in the US.

programme.desc: The Raneys attempt to save a single mother and her daughter from a rampant moose, Marty builds a bridge across a creek and Matt teaches predator deterrent techniques.

programme.desc: Pete and NTS build a five-platform "nature headquarters" for the For-Mar Nature Preserve in Michigan, helping a community still reeling from the 2014 water crisis.

programme.title: Pit Bulls And Parolees
programme.desc: Tia is faced with her biggest rescue with a call about abandoned dogs. When Tia, M2, Kanani, and Earl arrive, its one of the worst cases of neglect shes ever seen.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Jay has one lady in his life and thats his ferocious attack cat, Marley. Marley will tear apart anyone who crosses her path - including Jay.

programme.desc: After historical wildfires strike Australia, the Irwins race to rescue as many animals as possible. Robert and Terri help the severely injured koala population.

programme.desc: An adventurous puppy falls off a trampoline, can Dr. Jeff and Petra mend its broken leg? Meanwhile, Susan takes care of a litter of kittens and their mum.

programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: Antonio and the team make a mountain cabin safer for Chickie, a blind senior dog. Plus, they build a Japanese-inspired indoor dog lounge.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: A team of researchers seeks answers to mysteries surrounded the Mothman. They explore theories that the legendary cryptid is an abnormality in the evolutionary chain.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Matt, Bam, Bear and Gabe feel the strain of making deliveries in harsh conditions. Plus, circumstances force a decision that will change the lives of the wolfpack.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: The Raneys attempt to save a single mother and her daughter from a rampant moose, Marty builds a bridge across a creek and Matt teaches predator deterrent techniques.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Jordan Carbery investigates a noise outside his cabin and encounters a massive grizzly bear. And, Zanele Fox is thrown from a raft and ravaged by a crocodile.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: A family who dedicate their time rescuing animals in Australia, release Crickey the koala back into the wild after a year of nursing him back to health.

programme.desc: Pete and NTS build a five-platform "nature headquarters" for the For-Mar Nature Preserve in Michigan, helping a community still reeling from the 2014 water crisis.

programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: Antonio and the team make a mountain cabin safer for Chickie, a blind senior dog. Plus, they build a Japanese-inspired indoor dog lounge.

programme.title: Animal Cops Philadelphia
programme.desc: In this special edition, join the rookies to discover what it is like learning to fight crime in one of the toughest cities in the US.

programme.title: Animal Cops Phoenix
programme.desc: Investigator McHugh finds a dog with a missing leg, and AJ is horrified to discover a puppy dying from a tick infestation.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: A team of researchers seeks answers to mysteries surrounded the Mothman. They explore theories that the legendary cryptid is an abnormality in the evolutionary chain.

programme.title: Court-circuit
programme.desc: Trois courts metrages qui partagent le sentiment detre "assis entre deux chaises" : "Balkan, Baby" de Boris Gavrilovic, "Bull’s Heart" de Margarita Bagdasaryan et "Challenges of a Solitary Mind" dAstrid Rothaug.

programme.title: Le ressentiment
programme.desc: 1990, en Ukraine sovietique. Yasha, 17 ans, subit l’hostilite de sa directrice d’ecole et de ses voisins en raison de son identite juive. Malgre les conseils de son père, le jeune homme se laisse envahir par sa colère... Presente en première mondiale à la Berlinale 2024, ce court metrage poignant raconte la quete de liberte d’un adolescent.

programme.title: 42 - La reponse à presque tout
programme.desc: Dans une societe democratique, les decisions sont reputees relever du libre arbitre. Mais est-ce toujours le cas ? Sachant que le cerveau se met parfois en mode "pilote automatique", la liberte de choix n’est peut-etre qu’une illusion. Et si nos choix etaient davantage dictes par des facteurs physiques ou neurologiques ?

programme.title: Les maîtres des abeilles
programme.desc: Au coeur des montagnes cevenoles vivent des colonies d’abeilles noires "Apis mellifera". Pour proteger les abeilles, aujourd’hui en danger de disparition, et preserver une tradition en desherence, Stephane Liberi, berger et apiculteur, a cree son rucher à 800 mètres d’altitude, en collectant une à une de vieilles ruches-troncs recuperees dans la region.

programme.title: Georgie, le port de tous les enjeux
programme.desc: L’arret de la construction d’un port d’envergure en Georgie temoigne des tensions qui animent le petit pays caucasien. Tourne en 2022, ce documentaire souligne combien le cap semble encore indecis entre viree à l’Est ou à l’Ouest.

programme.title: Un monde nouveau
programme.desc: Face à un avenir assombri par la crise climatique, le realisateur et militant ecologiste Cyril Dion parcourt le monde à la rencontre de personnes qui ont revolutionne une region, un pays ou une activite, et esquisse un nouveau recit : celui d’un monde plus juste et plus ecologique.

programme.title: Un monde nouveau
programme.desc: Face à la crise climatique, Cyril Dion part à la recherche d’un monde plus juste et plus ecologique. Dans ce volet, il rencontre le survivaliste John Ramey et le collapsologue Pablo Servigne. Il raconte aussi comment la ville du Cap, en Afrique du Sud, a mis en place des mesures drastiques de rationnement deau, et comment Cuba a cree de nombreuses fermes urbaines pour eviter la famine.

programme.title: Un monde nouveau
programme.desc: Aux quatre coins du monde, Cyril Dion decouvre de formidables initiatives pour regenerer les forets, les sols, les recifs coralliens, les modes de culture mais aussi les democraties et les systèmes educatifs.

programme.title: ARTE Junior, le mag
programme.desc: Pour les 10-14 ans, lactualite internationale et europeenne traitee à hauteur denfant, à partir de questions posees par des elèves du primaire français et allemand, de portraits denfants ou de reportages.

programme.title: 42 - La reponse à presque tout
programme.desc: Galaxies, etoiles, planètes… L’Univers et tout ce qui le compose ont-ils toujours existe ? Ou bien un big bang a-t-il donne naissance à toutes les merveilles du monde observable ? Et, dans ce cas, qu’est-ce qui a declenche le boum originel ?

programme.title: 100 ans d’evolution de l’habitat
programme.desc: Il y a cent ans naissait l’architecture moderne, un nouveau modèle centre sur la lutte contre l’insalubrite et l’exiguïte de l’habitat. Dans cet episode : la salle de bain privee. Longtemps un luxe reserve aux plus riches, elle devient accessible aux classes populaires à partir de 1924 grâce aux cites ouvrières developpees par Le Corbusier en France ou par Bruno Taut en Allemagne.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: Chaotique, bruyant et froid, le monde actuel laisse peu de place à la chaleur humaine et au calme. Le "cocooning" entend pallier ce manque, comme une invitation à se replier sur soi pour s’accorder reconfort, securite et intimite. "Twist" part à la rencontre d’artistes qui explorent cette notion, chacun à leur manière.

programme.title: Au-delà des nuages : les Andes
programme.desc: Au cœur de la cordillère des Andes, l’Équateur deploie une grande richesse de traditions et de savoir-faire. Des festivites de la “Mama Negra” à Latacunga au tressage des chapeaux panamas à Cuenca, en passant par les rites des chagras, des gardiens de betail montes à cheval, à Machachi, ce voyage met en lumière un patrimoine varie et vivant, veritable ciment de l’identite equatorienne.

programme.title: Cuisines des terroirs
programme.desc: Situee en Mediterranee, à quelques encablures de la côte albanaise, Corfou est la plus septentrionale des îles Ioniennes. Ses hivers pluvieux en font l’une des plus vertes de Grèce. Alexandra et Nikos Guliumis se sont lances dans la culture de kumquats il y a dix ans, mais leur production n’est proposee que depuis peu sur les etals des marches et commerces de l’île.

programme.title: Les Trans-Europ-Express, des trains de legende
programme.desc: Symboles d’integration europeenne et modèles de confort : trente ans après leur disparition, les mythiques trains Trans-Europ-Express continuent de fasciner.

programme.title: Un billet de train pour la côte des fjords norvegiens
programme.desc: Sous le soleil de minuit, cap sur la magnifique ligne du Nordland, qui longe la côte norvegienne en traversant le cercle polaire, à bord de linsubmersible serie documentaire dARTE.

programme.title: Alerte aux ours en Transylvanie
programme.desc: En Transylvanie, les ours sont plus nombreux que nulle part ailleurs en Europe. Si ces grands predateurs à fourrure beneficient d’une certaine popularite dans l’imaginaire collectif, la cohabitation avec les humains n’en demeure pas moins compliquee dans la realite...

programme.title: Quand lhistoire fait dates
programme.desc: La banqueroute du système financier imagine par l’ecossais John Law pour liquider la dette colossale laissee par le règne de Louis XIV est le premier grand krach de l’histoire europeenne. Mais est-ce la faillite de la banque à billets qui fait date, ou ce qu’elle revèle du fonctionnement de la monarchie française en un moment crucial, celui de la Regence ? Avec lhistorien et economiste Arnaud Orain.

programme.title: Meurtres à Sandhamn
programme.desc: Une celèbre autrice de romans policiers est retrouvee morte à son domicile. Alors que Nora decouvre que sa propre famille est impliquee, le commissaire Forsman enquete, toujours en lutte contre son addiction.

programme.title: Antarctica, sur les traces de lempereur
programme.desc: Vincent Munier sur la banquise, et Laurent Ballesta dans locean, portent un nouveau regard sur lAntarctique.

programme.title: L’Arctique, une region bouleversee
programme.desc: Touche par le rechauffement climatique et la fonte des glaces, l’Arctique resiste encore. Sur les traces d’une ourse polaire, visite d’une region sauvage et menacee.

programme.title: Les maîtres des abeilles
programme.desc: En Argentine, la transhumance au fil de l’eau de centaines d’apiculteurs dans un veritable eden pour les abeilles...

programme.title: Les grands moments de la musique - Le documentaire - Martha Argerich et Daniel Barenboim à Buenos Aires
programme.desc: En 2014, Daniel Barenboim et Martha Argerich, ensemble au piano, creaient l’evenement au Teatro Colon de Buenos Aires avec des pièces de Mozart, Schubert, Schumann et Stravinski.

programme.title: Karambolage
programme.desc: Aya Kouame vit en Allemagne. Dans son contrat de location figure un long paragraphe dans lequel on lui explique quil faut qu’elle aère sa chambre : c’est le "StoSSluften", l’aeration par à-coups - Gros plan sur les couleurs du drapeau français.

programme.title: ARTE Journal
programme.desc: Chaque jour à 19h45, la redaction franco-allemande dARTE Journal propose une approche europeenne et culturelle de lactualite. Un regard original sur le monde.

programme.title: Henri Matisse, peindre de nouveaux horizons
programme.desc: Grand voyageur en quete de lumière, Henri Matisse a sillonne le monde, du Maroc à Tahiti, pour s’en inspirer, loin de tout pittoresque, dans une explosion de couleurs. Portrait de cet immense peintre, qui n’a cesse de se reinventer en conjuguant sensibilite et ouverture.

programme.title: Juge coupable
programme.desc: Frank Beechum, un jeune père de famille noir au passe de petit delinquant, est dans le couloir de la mort pour avoir tue une jeune caissière blanche qui lui devait de largent. Le jour de son execution, un article doit paraître sur lui et ses dernières heures de condamne dans le journal de la region. Steve Everett, un vieux journaliste passionne par les femmes et lalcool, couvre cet evenement.

programme.title: Clint Eastwood, la dernière legende
programme.desc: Du gentil cow-boy de ses debuts televises au mercenaire cynique des westerns de Sergio Leone, du flic tordu de Dirty Harry au photographe romantique de Sur la route de Madison, et jusquau vieil homme de ses derniers films, Clint Eastwood a incarne un eventail surprenant de personnages, tout en restant lui-meme. Son parcours est à son image : en mouvement, libre et riche de multiples facettes.

programme.title: Les pionniers de la musique de film
programme.desc: Un siècle de bandes originales de films "made in Hollywood", inspirees de l’heritage europeen, de Franz Waxman à Hans Zimmer, du classique au populaire.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput faints of thirst on a desert highway, so already it’s not a great day for the little orange shape-shifter. Add to that the fact that Specs and Skinny just happen by in a lockup van, and things go south pretty promptly. Specs and Skinny learn a valuable lesson: maybe if you’re going to anger a morphing super-blob by throwing them in the back of a van and withholding precious water, you shouldn’t do it whilst driving by a 100 foot cliff drop down to the open ocean. Hopefully these Docs are better swimmers than your average academic.

No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: A lab accident causes Lamput to grow giant in size! The Docs must find a way to deal with this gargantuan problem and catch him roaming the big city!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Safety standards at the Docs Lab remain shockingly low. Once, just once, it would be nice to invent something that doesnt then get out of hand and backfire, causing widespread chaos. Well, this shrink ray aint it. At first it works great (which is typical). Lamput is caught in a tiny vial, and the Docs are riding high on the triumph. Then they go over a small bump. Their risk management plan doesnt account for a "small bump". Before long Lamput and Skinny are engaged in a high speed chase through the Boss moustache. Seriously. Someone should just shrink this Lab right out of existence. No, wait, that happens too.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput has escaped yet again, and yet again, Specs and Skinny are in serious trouble with the Boss. He’s so fed up with their constant failure that he hires an out-of-towner: a super cool, hi-tech Doc who has all the moves and the attitude to match. The new guy’s hip to all of Lamput’s tricks, and before long, the shape shifting blob is safely back at the Lab. Specs and Skinny, robbed of their whole gig, end up on the streets, while Rival Doc gets all the glory. With glory comes blame, though, and when Lamput stages yet another signature crafty escape, the Boss turns all his fury on Rival Doc. Who hired this guy, anyway!? Lamput just wants things to be how they were. The orange blob helps the Docs get back their jobs at the Lab, Rival Doc is sent packing, and Lamput prepares yet another daring escape.

programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange figurine with the power to switch the spirits of two living beings and finds himself imprisoned in the body of a caribou.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. Instead of showing the reflection of the person who holds it, the mirror shows an idealized vision of his surroundings. Whether it be Grizzy or the Lemmings, everyone sees the world of his dreams, and no one wants to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan, the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tuffys wish to be as strong as Spike comes true.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An old pair of Gingers tap shoes turns Tom into a tap-dancing fanatic.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: It’s the middle of the night and Tom plays makeshift instruments creating loud music that wakes up Jerry. Jerry tries to put an end to Toms concert with no success. Tuffy wakes up and goes along with the music. Jerry decides to join in on the fun.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tuffy shows an interest in soccer, Jerry decides to be the little guys coach and show him how the game is really played by beating Tom in a one-on-one match.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is placed in charge of the preparations for the Duchesss surprise birthday party for her nephew, Rupert, and Jerry is determined to make a mess of it all.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An overprotective Spike goes to extreme lengths to keep his precious pup safe from harm.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Jerry sneaks into the party set up to steal some cheese while Tom is sleeping. Tom wakes up and chases Jerry across a table filled with all kinds of food. programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry work together to save a live turkey from becoming the centerpiece of a holiday feast.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The gang do battle with a magical broom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry causes Tom to lose eight out of his nine lives. Tom uses magic to bring them back, and instead is stuck with eight annoying ghost versions of himself. programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock – Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series

If the Queen’s new wallpaper is good enough for Her Royal Highness, then it’s going to be good enough for him. Meanwhile, his landlady, Mrs. Wicket, suffers from illusions of grandeur and crowns herself Queen of the street.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Interstellar Ella

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. Regular updates from Beijing and Washington D.C. keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: Learn the fascinating story of how 12 surprising forces have shaped human civilisation, helping to form the world of today.

programme.title: Secret History Of Humans
programme.desc: Learn the fascinating story of how 12 surprising forces have shaped human civilisation, helping to form the world of today.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: The team searches for Geronimos skull, which is said to have been stolen from the Apache warriors grave. Plus, investigating what became of Al Capones Cadillac.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: Best-selling author Brad Meltzer decodes ordinary objects in both the modern world and history – objects that contain secret messages, steeped in codes and symbols.

programme.title: The Curse Of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: A century-old familys secret lures Kevin and the team back to Georgia where new finds suggest that theres more Civil War gold to be discovered.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: Giorgio Tsoukalos, an expert on H2’s ‘Ancient Aliens’, is continually asked to visit sites and speak about the topics covered in the series. This show explores the possibility of a spin-off series, with Giorgio himself as the featured talent.

programme.title: Countdown To Apocalypse
programme.desc: As the world waits to see if the ancient Mayan apocalypse prophecy December 21, 2012 is correct, the new H2 series, Countdown To Apocalypse, tells the rest of the story.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: An exploration of the shapes and patterns seen when observing planets and galaxies, and how the form of the universe itself was created.

programme.title: Engineering An Empire
programme.desc: For centuries, this mysterious civilisation ruled a huge territory across South and Central America. But by 900 AD, it dramatically fell apart.

programme.title: Lost Gold Of World War II
programme.desc: In the closing months of WWII, legend has it that the Japanese buried something of immense value deep in the Philippine jungle. A group of investigators and engineers are using the latest technology to search for the treasure and the truth.

programme.title: Ancient Top 10
programme.desc: The greatest monuments of the world show more than wealth - they show power. From the secrets of Stonehenge to the jaw dropping temple of Karnak, which of these archaeological sites will be crowned the most jaw-dropping monument of the ancient world?

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: Investigate the facts and myths surrounding UFO sightings in every corner of the world. Examine evidence and eyewitness accounts and explore the mystery of what happened or what didnt happen.

programme.title: Rome: Rise And Fall Of An Empire
programme.desc: 113 BC. Rome is a small empire on the edge of the Mediterranean. After several disastrous defeats, the Roman elite are forced to turn to a commoner, Marius, to shake up the army and save Rome!

programme.desc: Bob Baer recruits a terrorist targeting officer, Nada Bakos; the team uncovers two planned escape routes for Adolf Hitler; Tim and James discover a vast tunnel system; Lenny and Gerrard investigate a massive compound hiding under the perfect cover.

programme.title: Engineering Disasters

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Chilly Autumn winds blow as Little Nutbrown Hare chases the beautiful fallen leaves. When one wafts so high that only a bird could catch it Little Nutbrown Hare wishes he could fly as well. He and Little Field Mouse try every way they can think of to fly, without luck. They have fun trying, however, and along the way they discover they have their own very special talents.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Crisp Autumn days are perfect for collecting pretty golden leaves and playing hide and boo. Little Nutbrown Hare is so excited that he accidently promises to play with two different games with two different friends on the same day. He can’t be in two places at once, so how will he keep both his promises and both his friends happy?

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: The class are having a boat race and all the boats have a different sail. What colour are the sails?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Red spots suddenly begin appearing on everything in Busytown from Mr. Rabbit’s mail box to Hilda Hippo’s roof! Huckle ultimately discovers that the red spots are really juice marks made from cherries falling from overhanging trees. / A teeny weeny piano motivates Huckle, Sally and Lowly to try to figure out who would own such a small instrument.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world Messy finds a magnifying glass in his bedroom and everything looks bigger! He wonders why that happens so he goes off to Okido to find out. Messy lands in Felix and Zoe’s garden and they invite him to come exploring in the forest with them and Tweedy, the famous Explorer. She was the first person ever to see the very rare speckled-freckled frog! Zim and Zam arrive playing hide and seek with Zoom, but he is in disguise as a bucket, so they don’t seen him. Messy looks through Zam’s binoculars and asks how they work.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: OKIDO is a kindergarten series about a curious blue monster called Messy. When Messy has a question, he goes to OKIDO, a town where his human friends Zoe and Felix live. Together they get help with the answers from scientific experts Zim, Zam and Zoom. The questions range from the origin of moon rocks to why humans are losing their voicesIn the real world Messy is cold and wonders if it’s going to snow! And he shoots off to Okido to discover where snow comes from. In Okido, it’s the middle of summer and Felix and Zoe are about to go to the beach, when a storm blows overhead and a snowflake lands on Messy’s nose! They realise that it really is snowing and soon the whole place is covered in deep, white snow! The trio are building a snowman when the Cloudship arrives and Zim, Zam and Zoom tell them that the snow is causing problems all over Okido… “If it doesn’t stop snowing, we’ll never go to the beach!” says Felix.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Raspberry and Lemon want to join a fashion contest. They offer Strawberry to be their model, but she is too busy running both her cafe and the market. Raspberry and Lemon meet the twins Sweet and Sour Grapes, whose names fit their personalities and offer them to replace Strawberry in the cafe.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry and the dinos are playing a game of I Spy, Harry decides to spy his dinos, but he cant remember their proper dinosaur names.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry and Charlie are arguing over what the moon is made of. In order to settle their dispute they take a rocket journey to the moon via Dino World.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Farah was driving her dirt bike but she stops as she hears a loud cries, grabbing her attention. She investigate and finds a baby moon bear crying for help. Back in the garden, Katie and Leo are playing tag. Leo blocks Katies path to touch Hero but Katie manages to tricks him. But Hero manages to escape as he was distracted by a butterfly. Suddenly, Farah calls for help through Leos watch, informing them of the poor animal cub with her. After the Junior Rangers learn that its a Moon Bear cub and wanting to help, they travel to meet up with Farah by riding PlatypusOne. Once theyre there, Farah tells them she has name the cub Cubby. Katie then reads her tablet and says that moon bear need to learn how to climb trees, swim, mark territories and communicate with other bears to survive, hence a montage happens of the Junior Rangers. Then they try teaching Cubby how to growl like a bear so they all imitate bear growling. Cubby gives it a try but struggle to do it. Ranger Rocky randomly appears and the Junior Rangers tells him of their situation. Ranger Rocky decides to call out his dear friend Ranger Joey and asks for help.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Percy misses his friend Gator and keeps thinking back to the times they had together. It’s making him sad, so the other engines advise him to keep himself busy to take his mind off it. So Percy rushes about trying to keep busy, and ends up losing control of some trucks which roll into an old mine. Percy is frightened to go in after them, until he remembers Gator again and what Gator taught him about being brave!

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: There is a coal shortage at the Clay Pits. Timothy warns Bill and Ben to go easy and spare their coal. But Bill and Ben don’t listen, teasing each other, and Timothy and messing about, until they do run out of coal! Luckily Timothy runs on oil, so he manages to keep going, delivering clay to the docks and bringing back coal for the tank engine twins.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: It’s circus day in Dragontown! But when Grisu comes to ask for a fightfighting job, he discovers the circus performers are not there yet to put up the big tent for the circus. So Grisu volunteers, along with Stella’s help. But it’s not easy! The sheep almost eat the directions, and the poles are heavy, and Fume gets in the way. In the meantime, Stranavoce travels across town to announce the circus, coming across the strange talents of some Dragontown residents. Just as Grisu and Stella have finished planting the poles and are ready to raise the tent, Stranavoce gets a call: Now the circus performers aren’t coming at all! Oh no!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Ratatino was supposed to be filming the very shy Leopard Monkeys for his new documentary in the jungle. But he fell at the airport and hurt his arm, so he asks Grisu to go in his place, to track and film the monkeys for him. Fume is happy to fly Grisu to the jungle as he hopes it will give him a chance to do some dragon training with his son. However, tracking the Monkey’s proves to be a very difficult task until Grisu discovers they like music and he turns Fume into a one-man jungle band as he films the Monkeys successfully.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is very proud of a Christmas Tree he has built from pine cones. So proud, that when Little Field Mouse accidentally knocks it over he has trouble forgiving her. When he makes a mistake of his own, Big Nutbrown Hare forgives him immediately, and he understands how important it is to forgive.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Seeing his tracks in the fresh snow inspires Little Nutbrown Hare to create a new game called ‘snow seek’. The friends have a lot of fun creating tracks for Little Nutbrown Hare to follow, but Little Redwood Fox’s tracks completely disappear and so does she. When Big Nutbrown Hare reports that Little Redwood Fox was sighted walking backwards, they work out how she managed to trick them all.

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: Badge Quest is a series in which Wilson, Brewster and Koko attempt to earn a badge. Almost every character from the first season is featured in these episodes.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Margaret is happy and proud to show to her whole family the clay vase, which she just finished. Wisely, she makes the children promise not to touch it, to let it out to dry. All agree and they go fetch water and flowers to fill in the vase… When they return, Rosie, Scoutbadger and Woodsy find the vase broken! Rosie accuses Woodsy: he’s the only one who came back to the burrow during their errand! Cornered, Woodsybroods but soon gets help from Loudo.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are building Spring City’s new Ice Rink when the Rockets arrive and plead with him to finish it as soon as possible. They explain that the rink they were going to be playing on that evening is out of action and they have no-where to play! Bob tells them he’ll do his best and the building begins. Muck is fascinated by the idea of Ice Hockey and when Bob and Wendy set off to get the clear plastic panels to fit in the barrier surrounds, Muck decides to have a little go himself. Despite Leo’s protestations, all the machines are soon skidding about on the ice causing mayhem! When Bob and Wendy arrive back, they are alarmed to see all the barriers knocked down! Muck says sorry but Bob knows that the Rockets will be back very soon and they need to work fast.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and his crew are finishing off the new extension to the Spring City Museum. They are awaiting the delivery of its first exhibit – a full sized Tyrannosaurus Rex skeleton. Mr. Bentley has come out in his lunch break to supervise the arrival of the skeleton. But while Bob is back at his yard Leo discovers to his horror that Mr. Bentley has bungled the dimensions of the doors to the new extension, and now they are unable to get the huge dinosaur skeleton inside. Lofty suggests taking the skeleton to pieces and reassembling the bones inside the building.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Huckle and the gang race all over Busytown trying to find the lock that fits and old key they found. They search everywhere from the Busytown Museum to Mr Gronkle’s antiques. They come up empty until they remember that an old roll top desk was being delivered to the antique store near where they found the key and had a lock on it. They try the key and it fits. / Chocolate sauce on Lowlys car leaves Huckle and the gang puzzled.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In New Zealand, Kyle practices his boomerang skills on the beach, but it gets carried away into the forest. While searching for it, he stumbles upon two Yellow-Eyed Penguins in the middle of the forest with one shooing the other away. Puzzled by their presence, Kyle contacts the Junior Rangers, who, in the Garden, are dealing with Heros impatience for his repaired jetpack. During the call, they learn that the penguin might be looking for its nest but suddenly, it scurries off towards the beach. The team travels to New Zealand in PlatypusOne to assist Kyle and the penguin but it’s nowhere to be found now. They try to figure out where the nest could be while the poor lost penguin checks nests of other penguin and gets shooed off everytime. As an attempt to look for it better, they use their jetpacks, and Kyle climbs a tree to search from higher ground but discovers no leads. With help from Ranger Rocky and information from Ranger Joey, they decide to look inland and use PlatypusOne to search from a birds’ eye view and eventually, they successfully locate the penguin’s fledgling and nest which results in a heartwarming reunion. Back at the Treehouse, Leo hangs a picture of the new penguin friend, celebrating another successful wildlife rescue. Meanwhile, Hero, now equipped with a fixed jetpack, flies excitedly in the garden but gets himself stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In the Alaskan wilderness, Jayden witnesses a grizzly bear cub being swept away in a river. Hero, Leo, and Katie, in the Garden, are practicing a search and rescue mission, with Heros flotation device when Jayden contacts them about the cub’s emergency. After a quick info segment about grizzly bears, they travel to Alaska in PlatypusOne. They try to chase after the cub but the river then divides into two ways. Unsure which way the cub went, the team split up with Katie and Hero flying ahead with their jetpacks to find the cub. Leo and Jayden then encounter Ranger Rocky who suggests they seek advice from Ranger Joey. Hero comes back to the boys and signals that he didn’t find the cub. Katie then joins them and warns them that the cub is approaching dangerous rapids. Hero is tasked to find the mother bear while the team rushes to the cub. When they reach the cub, it’s clinging to rocks as the rapids are pulling it away. They drop Heros flotation device and Hero practices his rescue skills, enabling the cub to safely reunite with its mother. Back at the Treehouse, they hang a picture of the rescued cub and its mom, concluding the successful mission and in the Garden, Hero is enjoying his well deserved time in the pool.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: In the park, Simon wants to impress Lou and her friend Sophie by playing superhero. But he comes to "save them" for the silliest reasons, and just about every minute, and each time it turns into a minor catastrophe. As a result, the girls have pretty quickly had enough of Simon, who on the other hand, doesn’t understand their reaction. And a good thing he doesn’t give up because when he saves the two girls from a big puddle of muddy water, he finally becomes a real superhero in their eyes!

programme.title: Berry And Dolly 05 Mepe
programme.desc: Berry the snail and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They have many adventures, while they make new friends and get knowledge about the world around them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the forest hold a baking contest to celebrate the arrival of summer, but Dr Owl goes overboard with tasting. With the help of Beetle Bodobács, they manage to save the evening with chimney cakes and dancing. The next day, Dr Owl apologizes and improves his mood with a group workout.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: On a rainy day, Dollys house gets flooded. When the rain stops, Stanley, the stag beetle, repairs the roof. Berry also helps Dolly, who is upset about her soaked drawings. Berry visits Raymond, the copper beetle, who has plenty of bells. He asks for two special bells to cheer Dolly up. At home, he makes coconut balls and later delivers them to Dolly along with the bells, which make her very happy. Later, Berry paints over the stain caused by the rain, and Dolly repaints the pictures with the help of Flutter and Leapy. The bells bring joy to the house.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Flutter, the butterfly girl, catches a cold on a gloomy, rainy day. Doctor Owl examines her and advises her to rest a lot in bed. Her friends visit often to take care of her, and Flutter always asks them to read from her new book. Soon, everyone knows the story, which tells of a ball held in a splendid castle. One day, Balthazar makes Flutter sad by saying that the princess story is just a fairy tale. Flutter turns away, disappointed, and falls asleep. Balthazar meets Doctor Owl, who notices that something is bothering him.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Mama Owls chicks are born, and soon they are strong enough for Berry and Dolly to visit them. Doctor Owl asks for their help while he works. The owl babies are very lively, and Berry and Dolly play with them enthusiastically and patiently. At lunchtime, Mama Owl is running out of patience, but eventually, they manage to feed the chicks. After finishing lunch and resting a little, the little ones regain their energy. They happily jump around Mama Owl, who feels it is time that the chicks learn to fly.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Alfonso, the cricket, plays beautifully on his violin for the forest inhabitants, but one day, no one listens to his new piece. First, he looks for Berry, Balthazar, and Stanley, but they are busy. He goes to Dolly, but she doesn’t have time either. Very discouraged, he decides to leave the forest. However, he meets the Magpie, who welcomes him and cheers him up. Meanwhile, the others begin to search for Alfonso. When they find him, they apologize and invite him to play his new piece at the playground opening.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: One autumn day, Reggie Squirrel is visited by his old friend, Otto Badger, who brings a frisbee as a gift. They happily play with it, and when they head home, the frisbee falls at the base of a tree. Later, Berry and his friends find it and play with it, but Balthazar throws it so far that the frisbee vanishes. Reggie Squirrel asks them about it later, but Balthazar denies having seen it. Dolly and Flutter find the frisbee and bring it back to Reggie. Berry, feeling ashamed, admits that they accidentally threw the frisbee and couldnt find it. In the end, they all play happily with it until dark, carefully making sure not to throw it too far.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Its snack time for Bing so Flop suggests they make a smoothie. When Bings carrot accidentally gets put in the blender, hes upset to disover he cant have it back.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing finds a frog in the garden, so he and Sula make the frog a house in a bucket.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing wants to play his car park game, but Charlie is visiting and keeps messing it up.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop play shadow tag until it starts raining and Bings shadow is outside getting wet.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Ida asks Molly, if she can look after her duckling Alina. But today of all days, Alina wants to learn how to fly and gets herself in some risky situations – and so Molly has to take some risks too.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Mole mother Gertrud has a cold, so Tilda watches her kids. The children teach Tilda how to dig. Unfortunately, Tilda’s tunnel leads directly to Rupert, who’s upset about the molehills in his garden.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: New guests arrive at Guesthouse Appleseed – the famous band “The Merry Mice” and two hares who want to record birds singing. But with the mice practising their music, the hares can’t hear any birds.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse pick lots of delicious strawberries. Little Nutbrown Hare eats all his and runs out so Little Field Mouse shares hers with him. When he goes to collect some more for his friend he eats them all too. Little Field Mouse shows him how to eat them really slowly to make them last longer.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare makes a slippery slide from a pile of snow and has so much fun he decides to keep it a secret and play with it all by himself. But he soon gets bored playing by himself, and invites his friends to play. They build bigger and curvier slides together and slide faster and faster. Little Nutbrown Hare learns it’s lots more fun to shares the joy with his friends.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: After Big Nutbrown Hare shows Little Nutbrown Hare a special place where his voice echoes, he and Little Field Mouse play a game of Try to find me with Little Redwood Fox and Little Grey Squirrel. They hide in the ravine and as their voices bounce off the rocky walls, their friends have a very tricky time trying to find them.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: The beach club has organized a potato sack race. Simon partners up with Maelle. But when Maelle gets injured during the race, its up to Gaspard to take her place.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers are on a quest to reunite a lost Malayan tapir with its mother. But their visit to the rainforest leads them to another encounter with… the Malayan tiger!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo chances upon a dawn bat while sketching in his garden. The Junior Rangers embark on a search after sundown for the dawn bat’s cave.

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: To earn their Snow Rescue badges, Koko and Wilson have to rescue Zephie, who is pretending to be stranded. They start to bicker about the best way to do it, causing Zephie to tip over. Now they have to do a real rescue! They realise they will need to work as a team and, using Calley’s rescue wagon, they get Zephie back on her wheels and earn their badges.

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: Koko and Wilson have to load their cars with special blocks and bring them back to Vee without dropping any or leaving any behind. They think this is the easiest badge ever – until they see that the blocks are oddly shaped and won’t all fit into the cars! Eventually they realise that if they slot the blocks together to make cubes, they fit into the cars perfectly. They deliver the load to Vee and earn their badges!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Nina finds T’choupi’s baby sister Fanni so cute that she suggests they go out and find other "babies," in the hamlet. Launching a "baby quest," she and T’choupi come across a chick, a baby rabbit, a caterpillar and a little snail! Next, they head to the woods to find more babies. But T’choupi suddenly gapes as he spots the cutest young animal of them all: a baby hedgehog, also known as a "hoglet."

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Luce has brought one of T’choupi’s favorite games: a Seek And Find game based on Nature! Mom comes along and suggests they go for a walk in the forest. The kids love the idea… as long as we can bring the game with! Mom agrees. But on the way, Luce drops the game, losing some of the pieces. She doesn’t say anything to the others, but when the time comes to start playing, the missing pieces make it impossible to continue past a certain point! Oh nooo!! So Mom suggests they play Seek And Find for real, in the forest! The first one to find a chestnut, a hedgehog or a frog…!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi loves picking vegetables in the vegetable garden! But when Mom asks him if he remembered to water the tomato plants, as per her request this morning, he freaks out: he was too busy having fun and forgot! In a mad rush, he gets Nina to help him find a way to keep Mom busy while he quickly waters the tomatoes. But it just doesn’t seem to work: the plants look positively sick!... But, what if there’s another way to tend to vegetables…?

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Anna introduces children to the unusual sound of the bassoon. The sound of this instrument is so distinctive that it reminds them of... an elephant! Seeing their delighted faces, Anna asks them to find objects in the school that make animal noises. While Ben and Lily find what theyre looking for, Charley is the only one to come back empty-handed... unless he has a surprise up his sleeve...

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam got a wrong idea about what Julias life was like when she lived on her island. Julia try to show Sam by immersing him in a tropical atmosphere, reconstituted at the Mouse Mansion.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: To participate at the annual cheese hunt with the other children of the residence, Julia faces a problem : she has a cold and cant sniff anything. Sam is going to help her to play with them anyway!

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Sidney is a very hard working diesel, but he’s also very forgetful. One day The Fat Controller gives him a very special job – Sidney needs to go to Brendam Docks to collect Percy’s new wheels. But when Sidney admits that he’s worried he might forget what he has to do, Thomas suggests making up a little song to help him remember. Sidney goes off happily singing a song about collecting a crate from Brendam docks, but when he stops to talk to Gordon he gets distracted, forgets what he’s supposed to be doing, and ends up at The Waste Dump looking for boilers then The Animal Park waiting for an elephant!

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Christmas is fast approaching and it is the last chance for children to post their letters to Santa. Percy is collecting the mail, but there is a lot of snow on the rails and it isn’t easy to get through. Harold teasing Percy doesn’t help either, but when Percy runs into a snowdrift it is Harold who volunteers to take the letters for him. Percy is cross at having to be helped, but when Harold doesn’t come back it is Percy who goes to find out what happened and help him in return.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Its dress-up day at pre-school today; a day to wear whatever makes you feel good. But before everyone in the class gets stuck into their imagination and games - theyre thrown off by Jefferys choice of costume.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou spends a day at the park and plays with a dog named Pepper!

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: It seems some sort of monster is causing havoc in Busytown Lake. The kids catch glimpses of it and find numerous finny footprints by the shoreline. However closer investigation reveals it to be Mr Fix-It’s latest invention – a swim fin-wheeled amphibious submarine car!/Huckle and his pals try to track down a bad driver.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey is expecting a visit from his friend Frog; in the meantime he practices his leapfrog abilities. When Frog finally arrives Monkey has an even better idea, that they play his favorite game… “Monkey See Monkey Do”!

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey thinks he’s got a scary roar although the fly that’s bothering him doesn’t seem to think so. Hearing his friend Lion, Monkey realizes that he needs to learn how to roar properly. With the ‘King of the jungle’s’ help Monkey plays his favorite game… Monkey see Monkey do!!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Four teams compete to win Malcolms Wildlife Photo Challenge

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Chaos ensues at Pontypandys first ever Country Market when Sarah and James try to outsell Mandy and Norman, causing apples to fly everywhere.

programme.title: Franklin And Friends
programme.desc: While on a Nature Nuts Scavenger Hunt, Franklin and Beaver get so into helping Goose - their assigned team leader - lead their team that they mess up the all their chances of completing the challenge. It’s only when they realize that the best way to help Goose lead is to let her lead, that the team gets back on track. / Franklin is a bit disappointed when clumsy Mr. Mole replaces clever Mr. Fox on their wilderness trip, but soon finds that Mr. Mole has many great wilderness skills if you give him a chance.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: As the Foxes leave to celebrate the summer solstice holiday at the Fox grandparents, Edmund sets about making a gift for Margaret. Indeed, this traditional holiday is all about giving gifts to those you love. The Twins are keen to make a present for Rosie. Thats great, but what should they do? Scoutbadger isthinking of something useful, while Woodsy leans towards something beautiful.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Bubble would like to see a new decoration in the jar and Doodleboo knows perfectly how to embellish it!

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Its spring, the season of lovers and flowers! Sketcky would very much like to offer one to Bubble but first we need to let it grow and especially protect it against all kinds of threats. Doodleboo knows exactly what it takes to get away from anyone who wants to steal his friends seed...

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Sketcky would like to discover the secrets and hidden treasures of Mother Nature. But it is not the spider who weaves its web that can accompany him! Doodleboo has a Riddleboo that will do the trick...

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave go in search of Littlest Bunny’s missing cuddly carrot toy. They search all the places that Little Bunny has played that day, one by one, without success. It’s only when they have learned to look carefully and check big open spaces thoroughly, by walking slowly in lines from one side to the other, that they find it. They also find Penny Hen’s lost scarf, Herman the Hermit Crab’s beach bucket and Cindy Squirrel’s missing nuts!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave have fun at the Animal Day Parade. They decorate their Rollypod trailers, transforming them into colourful floats and give some of their animal friends a lift to the parade. The parade queen is chosen and everyone ready, until Sneezy Sheep’s giant parade balloon floats away! Hatty saves the day and proudly leads them all in the parade.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends go on a hunt for treasure in the meadow and collect all kinds of unique gems like flowers, feathers, apples and egg-shells. But there’s a hole in Little Nutbrown Hare’s leaf-bag and he loses the precious collection along the way. Luckily, Big Nutbrown Hare is not far behind to collect the lost treasure as well as follow its trail to find his son.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse innocently pick lots of Spring flowers from a field and deliver bunches to their friends. When they realise that they are being followed everywhere by a cloud of yellow butterflies, they realise that the butterflies need the flowers, to feed from their nectar. How will they lead the little butterflies to more flowers and sweet nectar?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: One clear Spring night, Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse settle in to enjoy Little White Owl’s story of adventure and treasures. Inspired by her tale, the two set out to try and touch the most special treasure of all – a shiny star. They climb higher and higher but the beautiful stars seem just out of reach. Will they find a way to get their wish?

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and his friends play Nature Explorers in Ammas garden by spinning a giant colour wheel and then finding something of that colour in the garden.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing has enough money to buy one thing in Padgets shop but he finds it hard to choose between all the lovely things. After much deliberation Bing chooses a campervan but on the way home he begins to regret his decision.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Its bedtime but wheres Hoppity? Bing remembers playing with him in the garden so Flop finds a torch and together they set off in the dark for an adventure.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: If you get stuck, you need some help and then you can get down by yourself.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The bunnys friends gather for a cake party.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry, Dolly, Stanley, Balthazar, Flutter and Bubble are hiking in the forest on a beautiful autumn day. Suddenly they recognized that someone is crying in the bush. They found a mushroom without his hat. The friends immediately start to help him.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: One spring day, Frank longhorn beetle visits his friend, Stanley. Frank suggests to organize a football match. Everyone wants to play football, the two teams get together quickly. The girls cheer on the sidelines. The game is about to start.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Easter is here. The girls: Dolly, Flutter, Leapy, Zephyr and Rosita gather and start to paint the Easter eggs. They happily work all day, painting beautiful eggs.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: One night Berry is already in his bed, when he hears some strange noise. First he doesnt care, but the noise just getting louder. Finally he opens the door when the little green worm appeared. Long time no see friend just arrived.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The kids try to find the owner of a camera using the photos for clues. All the pictures are sporting events, so they eventually find out the camera belongs to the sports reporter for the Busytown Bugle./ A list Sally made mysteriously disappears right off the page.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Ever tried making a hay tower? Well Monkey did only not very successfully and when it was time to clean things up he got some unexpected help from his friend the horse. Horse was eager to play Monkey’s favorite game… “Monkey See Monkey Do”!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Mandy and Sarah are making a film comparing what dogs and cats are good at, and the cats are clearly doing better than dogs, even at fetch! But soon a kitchen fire gives Nipper the dog a chance to save the day.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: At a picnic on Annies farm, Peter comes up with a series of games that almost lead to disaster! Meanwhile, Lizzie and Jodie search for a rare seal.

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate wonders what’s wrong with her birdhouse— the birds aren’t visiting it. In Mimiloo, Kate, Mim-Mim and their friends offer to babysit a shape-changing baby squoosh so its mama squoosh can focus on building a nest. But getting the squoosh to nap and eat is harder than it sounds!

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate’s sad because her snowman is melting! In Mimiloo, it’s a sweltering hot day so Kate, Mim-Mim and their friends head to the Winter Waterfalls to cool down—only to find that all the ice is melting! To re-freeze the waterfalls, Kate will have to find Chilly, the snowman who keeps the Winter Waterfalls cold, snowy and frozen.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi is pretending to Nina that he’s able to read… but loses track of the story he’s trying to tell. An idea suddenly springs to mind: why doesn’t he just make up the rest of the story, in real life?!... The only thing they need to make it complete is a little chick to play the hero of their adventure. But when catching it turns out to be a lot more difficult than they’d bargained for, they realize they may just be living the true adventure, in real time…!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Inspired by Nina’s drawing of a rainbow, Tchoupi lists out all the colors within it. When he gets it wrong, Nina suggests they turn it into a game and look for the various hues in Nature. Loving the idea, Mom suggests they go find the colors on the flowers and vegetables in the hamlet. Nina and Tchoupi come back in next to no time, mission accomplished! Recognizing their talent, Dad ups the stakes, setting them the challenge of spotting the rainbow colors… among the animals! Mmm, easier said than done…

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: A new kind of biscuit has been delivered to the village shop and Molly would dearly love to know how they taste. Under Tildas alarmed gaze, she climbs up the counter on which the biscuit tin is standing, climbs inside – and when a gust of wind blows the lid shut, cant get out again. Horrified, Tilda rushes off to get help from Rupert.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets and Eliott play cards quietly in the living room, when they smell something burning in the kitchen. What a mess! Now Mommy’s cake is ruined! Eliott is really embarrassed, he has to bake the cake again. Mrs Gzell brings her sick cat for Eliott to nurse as shes going out. Eliott gives that important task to the Triplets. They are really excited! But between Toto, a particularly annoying fly and Imhotep who does whatever he wants, the Triplets have a lot of work.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets are at the beach and they’d like to make a present for Mommy, a pucka-shell necklace. But it’s not easy when there are only mussels on the beach. When suddenly, Turbulent finds a gorgeous shell, he puts it against his ear to listen to the sea when surprise! The shell tickles him, it’s a hermit crab which fascinate Poet and Girl. They imagine themselves living great adventures in the deep sea with their new friend. But during their game, the Triplets didn’t realize the tide had risen. They are stuck on their rock, how will they escape?

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Woodsy and Scoutbadger have a fight. When Rosie asks them to play with her, they refuse and ask of her that she choose her favorite brother. Rosie suggests that she spend some time having fun with each of them separately… The clever little vixen will succeed in bringing her two nearly-brothers to make up, without having to pick one between the two.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: After seeing him help Rosie with her toy, Mommy refers to Caillou as a "Kindness Superhero" which sends his imagination into overdrive. For the rest of the day "Super Caillou" and his sidekick "Super Gilbert" save an imaginary beach from Sharks and sunburn, whilst also making everyone in the real worlds day in the garden a little nicer, too.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou and his scout troop have been challenged to receive theirkindness badge this week! To do so, they must be kind to someone intheir community, look for acts of kindness in their lives, and, mostimportantly, be kind to themselves. Caillou is determined to finish histasks before Clementine!

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Shane is having too much fun to stop and refuel; that is, until he runs out of coal and is stranded in the hot, red desert.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: The chuggers are learning to carry passengers comfortably, using dummies specially made to wobble if the ride isnt silky smooth.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Everyone loves Frostini, the cool Italian ice cream chugger. Wilson wants to be just like him, so he’s especially excited to learn that Frostini needs a helper for the school holidays. Brewster and Wilson compete for the position by doing a trial ice cream delivery round. Wilson imitates Frostini, but the children aren’t impressed by his over confident attitude - which isn’t matched by his ability. They want Frostini back! While bemoaning the fact that he’s not cool like Frostini, a devastated Wilson forgets to put on the act and serves a little girl in his usual funny, cheeky Wilson-manner.

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Anna introduces children to the unusual sound of the bassoon. The sound of this instrument is so distinctive that it reminds them of... an elephant! Seeing their delighted faces, Anna asks them to find objects in the school that make animal noises. While Ben and Lily find what theyre looking for, Charley is the only one to come back empty-handed... unless he has a surprise up his sleeve...

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: A sad Ruff-Ruff learns how to be a happy puppy again, on his very own adventure. His friends are sure a new favourite stick, to replace his broken one, will make him happy, so they all set off to find one. By having fun and playing together on his adventure, Ruff-Ruff is soon ‘Ruff-Ruff-ier’ than ever, barking happily, wagging his tail and showing them all why dogs make such great friends!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: When T’choupi comes down for breakfast this particular morning, he finds the kitchen in a total mess! Nina comes and tells him that the vegetable garden has also been turned upside down! Who could possibly have done this?... At first, they suspect Ciboulette the cat… until they find out that the culprit is a super cute newcomer.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In the lush Amazon Rainforest, explorer Peyos discovery of a rare orchid takes an unexpected turn when playful pygmy marmoset younglings snatch it away. Believing them to be babies, Peyo calls the Junior Rangers - Leo, Katie, and Hero who were in the Garden, having fun imitating dances with each other. The team learns about pygmy marmosets, the worlds smallest monkeys from the computer. Arriving in the Amazon, they help Peyo to reunite the younglings with their family but first, they have to catch them as they keep jumping away! A spirited chase ensues with Hero, Pico, and the Junior Rangers pursuing the mischievous monkeys. They stumble upon Ranger Rocky who successfully catches one of the monkeys. Ranger Joey shares valuable insights into pygmy marmoset behavior. They find the monkey family near a river by finding trees with holes in them caused by the monkeys. But suddenly, Peyo alerts Leo and Katie of the monkeys playing on a branch dangerously close to the river. The branch snaps but with swift action from Leo, the monkeys are saved and returned to their family. Back at the Treehouse, Leo calls it a mission accomplished and finds Katie dizzy from trying to imitate Hero chasing his tail.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: Zephyr and Leapy decide to make a little surprise box for Dr Owls most beloved belongings. They want to decorate the box with shells, so the Robin flies them to the seashore to collect the most beautiful shells. They even get some help from the Crab, and get a ride back home on a back of a turtle.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: One day Stanley gets a silver robot from Frank as a present. The robot can move, make sounds and also flash its lights. When Stanley wants to show it to Berry, the robot slips from his hands and breaks into pieces. While Stanley and Berry are out to get some help, Bubbles finds the robot and repairs it.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: During Christmas, Dr Owl gets sick, and Bubbles cant seem to wrap his head around the fact that doctors can also get sick. Flutter helps him understand that the car of a car mechanic can also break down, and the shoe of a cobbler can also get torn sometimes. So the friends make a beautiful surprise for the old doctor.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: There are two balls in the kindergarden. One, the big bugs play with, and one for the small bugs. One day one of the balls bursts and they all have to find a way to peacfully play with the one remaining ball. Soon they realize that they can also play together, so Stanley admits that the small bugs are not that clumsy after all.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The Moonbug cant walk. The centipede always helps him to get him to where he wants to go. But one day the centipede has to go on a long journey, so the Moonbug is left to go alone to Alfonsos concert. But Eddy, the potatobeetle builds a special chair with wheels for Moonbug. The Moonbug can finally go alone to Alfonsos concert, and anywhere he wants to.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Its snack time for Bing so Flop suggests they make a smoothie. When Bings carrot accidentally gets put in the blender, hes upset to disover he cant have it back.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing finds a frog in the garden, so he and Sula make the frog a house in a bucket.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing wants to play his car park game, but Charlie is visiting and keeps messing it up.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop play shadow tag until it starts raining and Bings shadow is outside getting wet.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Its Bings turn to choose a game at Ammas crèche so he picks Musical Statues but gets upset when he loses because he chose the game.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry make the final preparations for the contest. Strawberry offers the twins to be models at the contest instead of her. Sweet is delighted, but Sour is not excited. Shortly before the show is broadcast, Sour sabotages the TV equipment.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Out on a walk, Scoutbadger, Rosie and Woodsy discover a mysterious unknown tunnel. While the first two are ready to explore it right away, Woodsy has more reservations. He would rather do things by the book: an exploration journey needs to be prepared! Soon, his brother and sister are taken aback by his behavior. Woodsy looks worried, not to say downright scared.Out of fear, he acts erratically, leading them to all end up stuck in a cul-de-sac.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare finds a very special feather with bright colours, spots and soft tickly bits.
